page.title: 18Leigh Residents' Comments.
page.content: We went to interview a local resident at his flat in Leigh. We asked,"What are the advantages of living here?" He replied,"It's close to London and there is a good train service. There is a regular bus service to the station, although unfortunately this has been cut back recently. My flat is also near the sea and there are beautiful walks too,in the Library and Marine Parade Gardens, where there are plenty of seats to sit on." We then asked him what games he used to play as a boy."Football,Beggar-my-neighbour and five stones. I used to play in the streets because there was less traffic." Another resident said she had lived in the area 39yrs.One of her most vivid memories was the sight of lorry after lorry taking sand to tip on the beach to make it sandy rather than stony.
